named-native-query.name: getInventory
named-native-query.query: SELECT IN_P_ID, IN_QTY, IN_ORDERED, IN_LOCATION, IN_ACC_CODE, IN_ACT_DATE, IN_VERSION FROM M_INVENTORY WHERE IN_P_ID = ? for update

named-native-query.name: getWorkOrder
named-native-query.query: SELECT WO_NUMBER, WO_O_ID, WO_OL_ID, WO_STATUS, WO_ASSEMBLY_ID, WO_ORIG_QTY, WO_COMP_QTY, WO_DUE_DATE, WO_START_DATE, WO_VERSION FROM M_WORKORDER WHERE WO_NUMBER = ? for update
